text: Gonzalo Rojas Pizarro (December 20, 1916 â€“ April 25, 2011) was a Chilean poet."Gonzalo Rojas, Chilean poet, is dead", Obituary, The Telegraph, 26 April 2011. In 2003, he was awarded the Cervantes Prize. He was born in Lebu, Chile. On the morning of April 25, 2011, Rojas died from problems caused by a stroke in Santiago at the age of 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * What Do We Love When We Love: Poem by Gonzalo Rojas Category:1916 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Miguel de Cervantes Prize winners Category:Chilean poets
title: Gonzalo Rojas
